entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 in the evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023
